item.description:
This is now definitely our first Meetup of 2013, to be held at our usual venue in Natick (in the All Saints Room, not the church hall this time).

Details to come, but please RSVP now!

Swap themes:

1. Cityscapes
2. Seasons (spring, summer, fall,
winter)
3. Make cards from goodie-bag swap


DEMO: Patterns with Markers! (the more common name for this technique is a trademarked process) Lori will lead us as we use sharpies and markers to create patterns like quilting with markers. Bring your sharpies (especially a black one) and blank, white ATCs if you have them around. Supplies and sharing will be available, so no need to buy anything ahead of time!
item.how_to_find_us: Go to far back end of parking lot. Turn right at "Church Office" sign. Enter building and turn LEFT--we'll be down the hall.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ January 2013 Monthly Meetup in Natick: All Saints Room (back of church)
